title: How to Draw a Spray Paint Design Using Toothbrushes

steps.headline: If you are not willing to spend much money, you can buy a pair of tooth brushes, water colours, paper (to paint on), and water(for the dilution of paint).
Take the paint and dip the toothbrush in it.
Press the bristles of the brush with your thumb and take it in a backward direction.
Aim it at the the paper and you will get the texture like the one in the sheet.

text: If you are not willing to spend much money, you can buy a pair of tooth brushes, water colours, paper (to paint on), and water(for the dilution of paint).  Take the paint and dip the toothbrush in it.  Press the bristles of the brush with your thumb and take it in a backward direction.  Aim it at the the paper and you will get the texture like the one in the sheet.  Finished.
